msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
SDK-31052 erase the CalloutSkin drop shadow when backgroundAlpha < 1
SDK-31028 New contentBackgroundAppearance style and CalloutContentBackgroundAppearance to remove content background shadow and/or color in Callout.

QE notes: ViewNavigatorCalloutSkin has been removed. Instead, set contentBackgroundAppearance=none on the Callout. It's no longer necessary to set contentBackgroundAlpha=1 on ViewNavigators inside a Callout.
SDK-31052 Drop shadow appears beneath arrow when Callout has a backgroundAlpha less than 1
SDK-31028 Callout skinning/styling should account for arbitrary use of a ViewNavigator child
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Add a flag to StyleProtoChain.initProtoChain() to allow pop-ups to disable inheriting styles from it's owner. Callout overrides initProtoChain() to change the default from false to true. This blocks Callout from accidentally inheriting undesired styles from it's owner that change the default appearance of it's contents.
QE notes: No longer need to undo the owner's styles inside Callout  and CalloutButton contents.
Doc notes: Callout takes inherited styles from the application.
SDK-31139 Callout contents inherit styles from the owner
